Detailed Description

LP8731 Regulator Property description structure.

Field Documentation

uint16_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::maxVolt

Maximum voltage supported by the regulator in 10^ (-4) V.

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::maxVoltVsel

VSEL value corresponding to the maxVolt.

uint16_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::minVolt

Minimum voltage supported by the regulator in 10^ (-4) V.

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::minVoltVsel

VSEL value corresponding to the minVolt.

uint16_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::slewRate

The voltage ramp delay in uV/us

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::stepVolt

Step voltage in 10^ (-4) V.

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::type

The regulator type namely PMHAL_LP8731_SMPS or PMHAL_LP8731_LDO.

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::vccrRampCtrlShift

Bit field to enable ramp to a given voltage

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::vccrTargetVoltSelShift

Bit field to select the target voltage

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::voltageControlReg

Address of the voltage control register

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::voltEnRegShift

Buck/LDO Output Voltage Enable Register bit field shift

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp::voltStatusRegShift

Buck/LDO Output Voltage Status Register bit field shift
